text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_cutAnywhere
text.text: The player can use a chainsaw anywhere on the map.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_createWoodchips
text.text: Woodchips are created when cutting trees or grinding stumps with a chainsaw.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_maxCutDistance
text.text: Maximum distance that the player can reach to cut with a chainsaw.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_defaultCutDuration
text.text: Number of seconds for a standard cut with the chainsaw.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_superStrengthValue
text.text: Maximum weight that can be lifted when super strength is active.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_normalStrengthValue
text.text: Maximum weight that can be lifted by the player with normal strength.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_superDistanceValue
text.text: Distance that player can reach to lift objects when super strength is active.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_normalDistanceValue
text.text: Distance that player can reach to lift objects with normal strength.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_maxWalkingSpeed
text.text: The normal walking speed of the player.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_maxRunningSpeed
text.text: The normal running speed of the player.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_reduceSideSpeed
text.text: Reduce the speed of the player when side stepping.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_destroyFoliageSize
text.text: The size of the detection area for destruction of foliage and bushes.

text.name: toolTip_lumberJack_showDebug
text.text: Print debugging text and overlay for detection area.
